abstract: Niagara Peninsula of Ontario, Canada, is home to diverse and distinctive wine region that produces many more varieties than ice wine it is known for.
lead_paragraph: Dry table wines are coming from a country better known for polar bears (and ice wine) than for pinot noirs.

headline.main: Exploring Canada’s Fertile Niagara Wine Region

snippet: Dry table wines are coming from a country better known for polar bears (and ice wine) than for pinot noirs.
